column1: The skin incision was closed with surgical tape.
To prevent this: - Eat healthy foods, exercise (if your provider advises you to), stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your stress level.
- If you are taking medicines for high blood pressure or diabetes, take them the way you have been told to take them.
- You may be instructed to take aspirin and/or a medicine called clopidogrel (Plavix), or another medicine when you go home.
